events.title: Stand-Up Comedy Show
events.description: A live stand-up comedy performance by a group of comedians, created to deliver laughter and entertainment and break the daily routine.

events.title: Live Music Night
events.description: A live music event featuring talented bands and artists, offering a fun and energetic atmosphere for music lovers.

events.title: AI & Machine Learning Seminar
events.description: An introductory seminar that explains the core concepts of artificial intelligence and machine learning, along with their real-world applications and career opportunities.

events.title: Web Development Bootcamp
events.description: An intensive training program designed to teach the fundamentals of web development, including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, with hands-on projects and real-world examples.
